      public Lobby isAvailable​(int lobbyNumber, java.lang.String playerName, ServerSocket playerSocket, int nPlayers)
      Parameters:
      lobbyNumber - lobby's identifier
      playerName - player's name
      playerSocket - player's client connection
      nPlayers - number of players the lobby can accept

    • startLobbyGame

      public void startLobbyGame​(Lobby lobby)
      Initializes the specified lobby, initializing all the components of the game (Game, Controller, and a "virtual view" for each player) and then starts the game, asking first for the players' gods and then starting the turn routine
      Parameters:
      lobby - lobby that needs to be initialized (it has reached its specified number of players)

      The server stays active for new player connections client connections
